item.title: Well im back with a whole new script
item.dc:creator: @hey321 hey321
item.description:
@hey321 wrote:

Hmm, whats the point of mouse? Just use clickmouse (x, y, True). Unless you want undetectablility. Mouse is slower so you have a higher chance of losing the ball.

Edit: I modified it so it works now, is this what you wanted?

[php]
program ballclicker;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
const

ballspot=0;
ballcolor=16777215;
procedure clickball;
var
x2,y2: integer;
begin
Repeat
WAIT(35+RANDOM(29))
if(findcolorspiral2(x2,y2,ballspot,1,1,511,413))or
(findcolorspiral2(x2,y2,ballcolor,1,1,511,413))then
mouse(x2,y2,3,3, true);
Until(false)
end;
Begin
repeat
clickball
until(false)
end.[/php]

Read full topic
item.source: Well im back with a whole new script

@reece844 wrote:

Well as you read my title my other scripts were pointless but im back with another one and if i get it fixed i will post edited version! It is a flash game that somone asked for so the web thing is â€¦ (will post in a second)

My script right now is

program ballclicker;
{.include Osi.txt}
{.include par.txt}
const

ballspot=0;
ballcolor=16777215;
procedure clickball;
var
x2,y2: integer;
begin
WAIT(35+RANDOM(29))
if(findcolorspiral2(x2,y2,ballspot,1,1,511,413))or
(findcolorspiral2(x2,y2,ballcolor,1,1,511,413))then
mouse(x2,y2,3,3, true);
repeat
until(false)
end.

Please help
